skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.
The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawiâ€™s own reserves.
Jorek is a highly-skilled Engineer, capable of seeking out and making the best use of the resources available to him.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: A Master Engineer knows all about firing rates, fields of fire and the best ratios, his knowledge improving efficiency.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +8% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: If a Master Engineer wants something, he'll get it. Quartermasters can rarely refuse a demanding Guild engineer.
Engineers always tinker, naming these tweaks "enhancements" - most do improve whatever contraption they are working on.
Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.
A dead eye shot is an Engineer or Thunderer that can hit a target at over five hundred (Dwarfen) paces.
Those Engineers that spend their lives underground have a good understanding of war in the caverns.
Master Engineers familiar with defensive formations use their centuries of experience in sieges.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +3% for towers during siege battles
	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for towers during siege battles
	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +15% for towers during siege battles
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those Engineers conversant in ballistics know how best to increase the ranges of their weapons.
A Sapper excels at breaking entrenched foes. He can quickly get artillery into the best position.

effects.description:
Speed: +3% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +8% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +15% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Get yer grubby hands off my machine or I'll have yer beard.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The beard always knows.

effects.description:
Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
	(own characters in province)

Ambush defence chance: +3%
	(own armies in province)

Ambush defence chance: +6%

Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(own armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: Now then, what's all this complainin'? There'll be none of that in my throng!

effects.description:
Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: I have the eyes of a hawk and the ears of a fox.
The smiths have already completed their order, the workers are in position and the masons are ready to begin.

effects.description:
Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: I can procure anything an agent might need for any mission.
My lord, we can save time and supplies if we make some slight modifications to this design.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -1% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -3% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -5% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: For use only in the most dire of circumstances.

	(own armies in region)

Ammunition: +6% when under siege
	(own armies in region)

Ammunition: +10% when under siege
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: You will fetch ammunition, clean and repair weapons, and do anything else our marksmen require of you

Reload time reduction: +3% when under siege
	(own armies in region)

Reload time reduction: +10% when under siege

skillTree.localised_description: No one is allowed in or out without my express permission. This is for their safety, of course.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Jorek's innate intellect means that, generally speaking, he is generally ahead of the curve.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This brave Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grimnir, the Warrior-God.
This industrious Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grungni, God of Mines and Smiths.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This loyal Dawi can trace his lineage back to Valaya, Goddess of Healing and Protection.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)
